actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Government Operations with amendment, H. Rept. 93-808.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #57 (308-0).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.
Committee on Labor and Public Welfare discharged in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, amended, (inserted the text of S. 2687 as reported).

official_title: An Act to provide the authorization for fiscal year 1975 and succeeding fiscal years for the Committee for Purchase of Products and Services of the Blind and Other Severely Handicapped, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Changes the name of the "Committee for Purchase of Products and Services of the Blind and other Severely Handicapped" to the Committee for Purchase from the Blind and other Severely Handicapped." Increases the membership of the Committee by one and directs the President to appoint the additional member. Defines "direct labor" for purposes of the Wagner-O'Day Act relating to the handicapped, as work required for the preparation, processing, and packing of a commodity or work directly related to the performance of a service, but not supervision, administration, inspection or shipping. Authorizes the appropriation to the Committee of $240,000 for the fiscal year 1974 and such sums as may be necessary for the succeeding fiscal years to carry out the activities of the Committee.

titles.title: A bill to provide the authorization for fiscal year 1974 and succeeding fiscal years for the Committee for Purchase of Products and Services of the Blind and Other Severely Handicapped, and for other purposes.

An Act to provide the authorization for fiscal year 1975 and succeeding fiscal years for the Committee for Purchase of Products and Services of the Blind and Other Severely Handicapped, and for other purposes.
